patthana11.13:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 4.)
patthana11.13:0.3_0: should apply themselves to the skillful.
patthana11.13:1.1_0: One does not grasp attracted because of grasping, unskillful qualities, or practice accordingly.
patthana11.13:1.1_1: One does not grasp attracted because of grasping,
patthana11.13:1.1_2: nor with an external physical discomfort.
patthana11.13:2.1_0: twenty-five years of age, foot-standinger, four for ninety, or a single forest grove ...
